title: Down - Live The House Of Blues, Chicago(Deluxe 2-CD)2002 ak320
description:
Down - Live The House Of Blues, Chicago,(Deluxe 2-CD)  2002 ak320

Down II: A Bustle in Your Hedgerow is the second album by Down, released on March 26, 2002. It was Down's first album in seven years since the release of NOLA, the longest gap between the band's three studio albums to date. Since Down was a supergroup, the band went on hiatus in 1996 so that members could focus on their main bands (namely Eyehategod, Corrosion of Conformity, Crowbar and Pantera). 

To support the album, Down toured on the second stage of Ozzfest in 2002. They also scheduled an 18-date tour that began May 1 in New York and ended on May 25 in Dallas.

On May 11th they were in Chicago at The House of Blues...

Bonus Tracks From Pepper Keenans Old Band Corrosion of Conformity
Where He was Lead Guitar and Vocals (In case anybody forgot Pepper Can Sing)


Players

Down

    Philip Anselmo – vocals, guitar on "Landing on the Mountains of Meggido"
    Pepper Keenan – guitar
    Kirk Windstein – guitar
    Rex Brown – bass
    Jimmy Bower – drums, all instruments on "Doobinterlude"
